Sorry for reopening this but I am having the same problem (host ubuntu 16.04, running on image latest-devel) and I don't understand how it is a user environment setup issue as the procedure he is following is exactly that defined in:
tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/docker/README.md

Shouldn't the development container (latest-devel) allow usage of docker natively or is there a magic trick to run the container so that it connects to docker running on the host? Doesn't seem like docker is included in the latest-devel image and the instruction explicitly state that the parametrized_docker_build.sh script must be run with a development image container.

Am I missing something?
